There are three different kinds of popcorn there, sweet, salty, and caramel salted butter. There is enough staff and they are very friendly. The rooms for screening are big enough to hold around 120 people, the seats are not exceptional but they are comfy. There are drink holders for each seat. You cannot recline the seats however.

I really like to go there, access is made easy with the tramway T1 there. Many movies are in original versions with French subtitles. Perfect for me who prefers to speak to watch movies in their original languages.

The whole area is very stylish with big posters, it looks very modern and clean.

This is a great place for cinema, many screens at the entrance to buy tickets ourselves. A big sitting area inside to wait for friends or family if we are too early, you can get some drinks and food. There are three different kinds of popcorn there, sweet, salty, and caramel salted butter. There is enough staff and they are very friendly. The rooms for screening are big enough to hold around 120 people, the seats are not exceptional but they are comfy. There are drink holders for each seat. You cannot recline the seats however.

I really like to go there, access is made easy with the tramway T1 there. Many movies are in original versions with French subtitles. Perfect for me who prefers to speak to watch movies in their original languages.

The whole area is very stylish with big posters, it looks very modern and clean.
